column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////The style's great but
column3: that's about it. "Ramen" people swear that this place is pretty good but
column5: I just can't recommend it. I've been here a couple of times and the food has been decidedly "meh" each time. Everything's overpriced
column7: here in my opinion and the concept ends up being more attractive than the actual product they offer.
